import{initializeApp}from"firebase/app";import{getAuth}from"firebase/auth";import{getFirestore}from"firebase/firestore";// Import getFirestore only once
import{getStorage}from"firebase/storage";// Firebase config
var firebaseConfig={apiKey:process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY,authDomain:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN,projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID,storageBucket:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET,messagingSenderId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID,appId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_APP_ID};// initialize firebase
var app=initializeApp(firebaseConfig);// Export auth and database instances
export var auth=getAuth(app);export var database=getFirestore(app);export var storage=getStorage(app);
